confirm.title: Confirm Deletion
confirm.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

deleting.title: Deleting Note...
deleting.subtitle: Please wait while we securely delete your note.

success.title: Note Deleted Successfully!
success.subtitle: Your note has been permanently deleted and can no longer be accessed.
success.redirect: You will be redirected to the home page in a few seconds.

error.title: Deletion Failed
error.subtitle: We encountered an error while trying to delete your note.
